reply: So what's your plan? You want to go running around Chicago waving a weapon around? That's ahgainst the law damn near everywhere. Just what is it you 2nd Amendment types want anyway? Last I heard, nobody in government is looking to take your right to bear arms away. This Illinois law doesn't say you cannot own a firearm, just that you can't go packing one around town unless you have a permit to do so. "I believe that banking institutions are more dangerous to our liberties than standing armies." - T. Jefferson
title: Most Libral Court In U.S. Upholds 2nd Ammedment Rights
